official_title: To amend title 11 of the United States Code to stop abusive student loan collection practices in bankruptcy cases.
short_title: Stopping Abusive Student Loan Collection Practices in Bankruptcy Act of 2014

summary.text: Stopping Abusive Student Loan Collection Practices in Bankruptcy Act of 2014 - Amends federal bankruptcy law to allow an individual whose student loan debt is discharged due to undue hardship to recover the costs of, and a reasonable attorney's fee for, the discharge proceeding if the court finds that the position of the creditor was not substantially justified.
